title: The case of several of Their Majesties loyal subjects very much oppressed, contrary to the laws of this land (as they are advised) humbly represented to the Honourable the Knights, Citizens and Burgesses in Parliament assembled.
author: Johnson, Thomas, 17th cent.
notes: Signed: Thomas Johnson, John Paine, Edward Battes, Will. Atkins, Nicholas Mash.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
